caption:
Evan Lo, better known as @flawed_mangoes, is quietly embracing his status as hopecore’s de facto poster boy.

“In my head, it was never ‘I want this to be motivational and inspiring,’ ” he says. “[My music is] toeing the line between melancholy and happy in that bittersweet sort of way. I guess a lot of people identified with both sides.”

See what else he had to say about hopecore as a genre, upcoming music and more in his Billboard digital Genre Now cover story at the link in bio.

📸: @djdumpling
